meanings.definition: Given an excessive amount of food.
meanings.sent1: The chubby cat looked overfed after eating too much.
meanings.sent2: The overfed dog struggled to run due to its large belly.
meanings.sent3: The overfed hamster rolled around happily in its cage after a big meal.
meanings.sent4: The overfed goldfish seemed to be swimming slower than usual in the tank.
meanings.sent5: The overfed squirrel lazily lounged in the sun, too full to move.

meanings.definition: To have been given an excessive amount of food.
meanings.sent1: The guests overfed the stray cat with leftover scraps from dinner.
meanings.sent2: I worry that I may overfeed my pet fish if I give them too much food.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tried to overfeed the ducks at the pond with bread crumbs.
meanings.sent4: She accidentally overfed the plants with too much water, causing them to wilt.
meanings.sent5: The chef warned not to overfeed the pasta with sauce, as it would become soggy.
